nodes.text: The Dette Lawnic Dance Academy was a famous dance academy on the planet Alderaan. At some point prior to their attendance of a party on the yacht known as the First Light in 10 BBY, the Twi'lek couple Hado Gwin and Boshti Anilee trained there for one year before entering the competitive circuit, where they won medals in three sectors.
The Dette Lawnic Dance Academy was first mentioned in the 2018 reference book Solo: A Star Wars Story The Official Guide, which was written by Pablo Hidalgo.
